name.en: Cross Promotion the Elite Noodle Ninja
name.ja: <ruby>火<rt>か</rt></ruby><ruby>麺<rt>めん</rt></ruby><ruby>上<rt>じょう</rt></ruby><ruby>忍<rt>にん</rt></ruby>ダイアップ

text.en: The head of the Noodle Ninja Corps who have advanced noodles, overcoming the odds, no matter how noodly things get. He'll gladly speak to people who know nothing of noodles, but he'll make sure neither his location nor his noodles are ever exposed in the process.
text.ja: あらゆる局麺を乗り越えて、麺々と進化する火麺忍軍の頭領。立場や麺子に捉われず、麺識の無いメンバーにも声を掛ける。
text.ko: 여러 가지 국면을 극복하고, 면면히 진화하는 화면닌군의 우두머리. 입장이나 체면을 신경 쓰지 않고, 면식이 없는 멤버에게도 먼저 말을 건넨다.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Chaotic Omega Rising!!
Strongest Battle Deck Maddox - Chemist-Meow Draw of Flames!
